params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.table
params.description: The table to which CSV data is imported.

params.name: data.columns
params.description: The columns to which CSV data is imported. If not specified, all columns of the database table are loaded with CSV data.

params.name: data.escape_character
params.description: Specifies the character that should appear before a data character that needs to be escaped.

params.name: data.quote_character
params.description: Specifies the quoting character to be used when a data value is quoted.

params.name: data.fields_terminated_by
params.description: Specifies the character that separates columns within each row (line) of the file.

params.name: data.lines_terminated_by
params.description: This is used to separate lines. If a line does not contain all fields, the rest of the columns are set to their default values.
